text: Ani tumacyavara ya babatitahi kahi gunha nahi ki tumhi isaryane kinva nakalataritya tya striyansi vivahababata bolave kinva apalya manata irada lapavava. Allahala cangale maahiti ahe ki tumhi avasya tyanci athavana karala. Parantu tumhi lapuna chapuna tyancyasi vayada karu naka, matra hi gosta vegali ki tumhi bhalepanaci ekhadi gosta bolavi ani joparyanta iddataci mudata purna hota nahi, vivahace bandhana majabuta karu naka. Laksata theva, allahala tumacya manatalya gostincehi jnana ahe. Tumhi tyace bhaya balagata raha ani hehi laksata theva ki allaha motha mapha karanara ani sahana karanara ahe
